title: OpenCart
description: To install the module, you will need to download the file below:
subtitle: Steps for OpenCart integration:

list.title: Login to your OpenCart admin panel.
Click Upload and select the zip file you downloaded.
Once installed, go to Extensions -> Extensions and under “Choose the extension type”, select “Shipping”
Find OptimalShip in list of extension. If the module shows a red minus icon, it is already installed. If the green + icon is showing, click the icon to install the extension.
Click the Edit icon for the OptimalShip extension

orderedList: your Export Number for the Account Number
add a surcharge if you’d like (it can stay 0) – this will be added as a flat fee on top of our total charge
Enter the Carrier Title – “DHL with OptimalShip”
Select countries to ship to – you can click “Select All” at the bottom. This will be all countries minus the US.
Under Tax Class – most likely select “Taxable Goods”
Enable Dimensional Weight – select “Enabled” – this requires that your products have dimensions associated with them
Sort Order – 1 is the top of the list

list.title: Click the Save icon at the top of the page
Go into your store and test it out. Please make sure you try it on an international address.
